name: NSHTTPURLResponse
desc: The metadata associated with the response to an HTTP protocol URL load request.

items.name: - initWithURL:statusCode:HTTPVersion:headerFields:
items.desc: Initializes an HTTP URL response object with a status code, protocol version, and response headers.

items.name: - valueForHTTPHeaderField:
items.desc: Returns the value that corresponds to the given header field.

items.name: + localizedStringForStatusCode:
items.desc: Returns a localized string corresponding to a specified HTTP status code.
